original_title: The Prince of Beverly Hills Comes Again
overview: They call him "T-Bone", and they call him a lot! He's the living legend of the oversexed and underloved women of Beverly Hills who can't get out of their Gucci originals and Cartier jewelry fast enought...because he's the answer to a horny rich girl's sordid sexual dilema. And now he's got the perfect routine for enjoying more of that soul-satisfying, lip-smacking, rich bitchin' action, because he's started a dating and escort service for these lusty ladies, with the accent on 'service'. But because his time is usually spent stroking and seducing the pent-up erotic fantasies of his women, his grip on the new business is somewhat loose - and some hilarious and arousingly stimulating situations occur, with fur-draped chicks all over Rodeo drive balling every guy from the local mechanic to the piza delivery boy, thinking it's the "STUD" himself! Get ready for a command perforamance of the ultimate dude in the raunchy royalty of the rich and famous!
tagline: ...join Kristi Leigh, Cherri Hill, Melinda Lee, Ray Victory, Don Fernando, Marc Wallace and David Sanders as they get it on in the lusty land of the rich and infamous!
title: The Prince of Beverly Hills Comes Again
